PRODUCT Description(H1)

is designed suitable for use in the polishing of high purity water in mixed bed units for polishing after primary demineralization system.

PRODUCT Description(H2)

Appearance Brown/yellow, translucent, gel
Function Group Sulfonic acid/ Quaternary amine
Ionic form as shipped H+/ OH-
Total Capacity in volume, min. eq/L 1.80/1.00
Uniformity coefficient, max. 1.6
Water content, % 50-60
Water content, % 50-60
Density, approx. g/ml 1.10
Bulk density, approx..g/L 68-700
Bead size,95%, mm 0.35-1.25
Bulk density, approx..g/L 68-700
Bead size,95%, mm 0.35-1.25
Bulk density, approx..g/L 68-700
Bead size,95%, mm 0.35-1.25

PRODUCT Description(H2)

Ixteqlite a trademark of IXTEQ Inc. and its affiliates, USA. Ion exchange resins and polymeric adsorbents may contain by-products resulting form the manufacture process. The user must determine which by-products must be removed for any particular use and must assure that the appropriate level of purity is achieved for that use. The user must ensure compliance with all present safety standards and regular requirements governing the application. IXTECH does not recommend its products, as supplied, as being suitable or appropriately pure for any particular use. Nitric acid and other strong oxidizing agents can cause explosive type reactions when mixed with ion exchange resins. Before using strong oxidizing agents in contact with ion exchange resin, consult sources knowledgeable in the handling of these materials. All information and our technical advice are given in good faith but without any warranty, either expressed or implied as to the accuracy or appropriateness of these data and expressly excludes any liability upon IXTEQ arising out of its use. Our advice does not release you from the obligation to check its validity and to test our products as to their suitability for the intended processes and uses. The application, use and processing of our products and the product manufactured by you on the basis of our technical advice are beyond our control and, therefore, entirely your own responsibility. Material safety Data Sheets outlining the hazards and handling methods for our products are available on request.a
